snippet.title: Pikmin 4 - Announcement Trailer - Nintendo Direct 9.13.2022
snippet.description:
Two words: Pikmin 4!

Pikmin 4 will arrive on Nintendo Switch in 2023! 

https://www.nintendo.com/store/products/pikmin-4-switch/?cid=N1121:ch=pdpd&gclid=CjwKCAjw_aemBhBLEiwAT98FMkJth32dLIGDM_UjD3jYij_gj8hgOO2RQ1mDXgyrhVmHUHJp0OMBDBoCNj4QAvD_BwE   

#Pikmin #Pikmin4  #NintendoDirect #NintendoSwitch
